job.title: Observability Platform Engineer - Elasticsearch RWF
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThe Chief Technology Office Enterprise Observability Team is responsible for delivering innovative scalable stable and secure products that provide deep business insight operational insight and predictive analysisbrbrAs a member of the team you will be a key contributor to the development of products that provide full stack observability including application monitoring logging alerting and visualizationbrbrThe Observability Software Engineer will design develop and implement near realtime data streams ingesting and enriching business and operational data from various sources across the organization as part of a new enterprise observability platformbrbrstronguThe Ideal Applicant Will HavebrustrongulliDemonstrated experience with the ElasticSearch Logstash and Kibana stackliliInstallation and configuration of ClustersliliIndexing DataliliQueries Aggregations MappingsliliCluster Administration and AutomationliliAct as the subject matter expert for ELK implementation across the shared service platformliliCollaborate with other observability engineers when working on cross team effortsliliAbility to integrate with other operational data platforms and tools including Kafka Splunk etcliliExperience with other observability products such as AppDynamics ITRS Geneos Datadog NewRelic Prometheus Grafana Wavefront etcliliProven trackrecord of partnering with internal customers architects engineers and other technical partners to gather requirements understand existing systems and develop valueadded productsservicesliliExperience in deploying and operating time series metrics Database Prometheus Cortex etcliliExperience in supporting distributed tracing architecturebrliulRWF  Please note that RWF is an identifier for internal recruiting purposes only and has no connection to the nature or responsibilities of the jobbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli5  years of experience with Elasticsearch development integration or supportlili2 years of automation experiencelili5 years of software engineering experiencebrliulstronguDesired QualificationsbrustrongulliA BSBA degree or higherliliAgile experienceliliAbility to develop partnerships and collaborate with other business and functional areasliliGood verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliliStrong analytical skills with high attention to detail and accuracylili2  years of experience with Elasticsearch development integration or supportliliKnowledge and understanding of Cloud computing PaaS design principles and micro services and containersliliScripting and automation experienceliliExperience with data streaming technologies and use casesliliExperience with RESTful API callsliliStrong verbal written and interpersonal communication skillsliliAn industrystandard technology certificationbrliulstronguOther Desired Qualificationsbrustrongulli3 years of experience building solutions involving logging metrics and traces to meet or exceed business requirementsliliExperience with site reliability engineering practices for monitoring reporting and visualization of service level objectives and key performance indicatorsliliUnderstanding of application tracing technologies and can work directly with development and platform support teams to enable these technologies eg Open Telemetry Jaegerlili2 years working with configuration and monitoring experience with GrafanaliliAdvanced experience with Kibana to include developing and manipulating Kibana for visualizations and analysisliliUnderstanding of software design as it relates to ElasticSearch deployments or distributed computing  system architectureliliExperience designing real time and batch log analytics and search solutions using ELK stackliliDesign and implement multitenancy in ElasticSearch for data isolation and visualization in Kibana by different tenants of the shared serviceliliExperience designing implementing deploying and managing large ElasticSearch clusters and ELK solutionsliliExperience working with crossfunctional teams to plan model and implement solutions utilizing Kafka and ELK technologiesbrliulstrongJob ExpectationsbrstrongulliAbility to work on call as assignedliliFlexibility to address incidents as needed 24 hours a dayliliAbility to work additional hours as neededliliAbility to travel up to 10 of the timebrliulstrongDisclaimerbrbrstrongAll offers for employment with Wells Fargo are contingent upon the candidate having successfully completed a criminal background check Wells Fargo will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of applicable local state and Federal law including Section 19 of the Federal Deposit Insurance ActbrbrRelevant military experience is considered for veterans and transitioning service men and womenbrbrWells Fargo is an Affirmative Action and Equal Opportunity Employer
